newsitem.title: FRANCE: RESEARCH ALERT - Paribas raises Alcatel.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Paribas raises Alcatel.

text.p: Paribas Capital Markets raised its 1997 and 1998 profit estimates for Alcatel Alsthom on Monday after already having upgraded the stock to "buy" from "neutral" on Friday.
Analyst Antoine Boivin-Champeaux said he raised his 1997 net income forecast to 5.7 billion francs from five billion and to 8.9 billion from 7.67 billion for 1998.
This follows Alcatel's first half sales figures on Thursday evening.
For 1999, Paribas sees a net income of 10.8 billion rising to 13.09 billion in 2000. Paribas said that Alcatel's share had a potential to rise 20 to 25 percent.
At 1109 GMT, Alcatel was down 1.28 percent at 848 after a 6.18 percent rise on Friday.
